Desc.entry:
Delivers high quality cutting edge self defence and personal protection training to individuals, community groups and businesses. Short programmes can be commissioned off the peg or tailored to meet the needs of the client.
The curriculum offer includes useable practical techniques to deal with violent encounters alongside the legal, physiological and psychological knowledge that places them in context and fully empowers the student. Company limited by guarantee 6769637.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Training is organised to suit the client
